name: OddPlanet
description: OddPlanet is a side-scrolling adventure game inspired by Limbo and Oddworld.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB with Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
